title: shanthamana mathi
sahitya:
shAntamAna mati ezhundadu cakravAkam kUDIk-kuzhaindadu



anupallavi



kAntam pOloru shakti vIshiDak-kAdalan mukham kanindu pEshiDa



caraNam



nAvellAm tirunAmam AgiDa nan manam aruLanbu kUDiDa

jIvanE shivamaNam kamazhndiDa cirsukhAnubhavam pirandiDa vA vA vA vA
